body: Playing with the stage staff and all are risky play though. With those big heads, they would at least be more trustworthy to keep a secret and treat it as business. But these guys, if Yuuma starts playing with more guys, there might be at least one who flipped at knowing the idol had sex and raged in public. | Anyway the punchline! ^^; "See, it feels better with a girl, I'm not gay" (make up artist pulls out his dick) "...am I?"
